name: THE GAME HAS BEGUN
description:
This is an old style point and click little adventure reminiscent of the acin=ent flash games of yesteryear. Try to find your way to peace! Or search for the horrors of THE DARKNESS. I made this right near the end of 2019 in an attempt to make a few flash games before the eras end. Enjoy!

NEEDS FLASH PLAYER INSTALLED ON COMPUTER
